commit message: Friendly notification for Android-Versions where visibility is unsupported
Move more strings to resources to allow translations
Update values and add a german translation
Rework layout after the Material Design guidelines
Set EditText's input-tags to enable word-capitalization
Move more hardcoded strings to values and update its german translation
Close dialog after removing persistent pin
Allow making pins permanent in EditActivity
Generate notification id between 1 and 2147483647, allowing up to  2147483647 different pins
Set pins priority to min, incase it should be permanent
'show when' is only available for SDK >= 17
Move all leftover strings to values
